content.question: Which of the following hypotheses is most consistent with the data in the table?

choices.label: The mobile app release did not have any effect on the average number of daily messages sent per user.
The mobile app release discouraged new user registration on the site.
The mobile app release led to users being less frequently active on the site.
The mobile app release led to users tending to write shorter messages.

content.answer: The mobile app release led to users tending to write shorter messages.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how knowledge can be generated from data.
